Title: Prohibits exclusive vending and minimum purchase provisions in contracts involving the lease of reverse vending machines
Summary: Prohibits exclusive vending and minimum purchase provisions in contracts involving the lease of reverse vending machines.
LawCode: Add ยง396-uu, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to prohibiting exclusive vending and minimum purchase provisions in contracts involving the lease of reverse vending machines
